channel.title: New Realm 718/742 | T90 Weapons | 120 Capes w/particles | Active Staff
channel.description:
[CENTER][url=https://www.upload.ee/image/5441913/Adv_Title.png][img]https://www.upload.ee/thumb/5441913/Adv_Title.png[/img][/url] [url=https://www.upload.ee/image/5447218/New-Realm-Banner_256.gif][img]https://www.upload.ee/thumb/5447218/New-Realm-Banner_256.gif[/img][/url][/CENTER] [center][size=14pt][b]New Realm 718/742 is a new RSPS developing an amazing community and online presence. We have so much content to suit all different types of players as you will read about further on into this thread. Thank you for taking your time to read our offical advertisment thread and we hope you enjoy it - The New Realm Team[/b][/size][/center]
[center][size=24pt][u][b]Links[/b][/u][/size][/center] [center] [size=14pt][color=blue]Website: [url=http://newrealm718.enjin.com/]http://newrealm718.enjin.com/[/url] Forums: [url=http://newrealm718.enjin.com/forum]http://newrealm718.enjin.com/forum[/url] Direct Download: [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/0sv9k3meu45404b/NewRealm.jar?dl=0]https://www.dropbox.com/s/0sv9k3meu45404b/NewRealm.jar?dl=0[/url][/center]
[center][size=24pt][u][b]Features[/b][/u][/size][/center]
[center][size=14pt][b]-All T90 Weapons -Full GWD -Many Bosses ( KBD, QBD, Nex and custom bosses such as Hope Devourer, Pest Queen etc! -Ranks: Mod, Admin, Owner, Donator, Super Donator, Extreme Donator (+dicer), Spawn and Support! -Server Statistics quest tab -Home is great and unique! -Pvp System (kill streak, Hiscore) with Pvp shop - Ganodermic lair & Dragon lair - Fully working loyalty point and shop system - Full Dagganoths with RS drops! - Flaming skulls - Special attacks for all items the should have - Glacors with T85 Boot drops. - Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP and a Repair stand to repair them! - Auras are all complete and working (Purchasable with loyalty points) - 100% Godwars Bosses - Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks - Frost dragons - Dominion Tower - Fast Switching - Storm Of Armadyl Spell - Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers/Lunar) - Awesome donator and skilling zone - FULL RUNESPAN - 90% WARRIORS GUILD - All new 742 armours with bonuses - Working Duel arena - Falconry Hunter - Gnome advanced -The ability to switch between Item looks (::switchitemslook) -All 120 capes with particles! -Portals to teleport around New realm -Active staff to keep the server running flawlessly -Loads of custom minigames such as zombies, cage etc! -Many PVP locations. -All skills fully working. -Working Bank tabs.[/b][/size][/center]
[center][size=24pt][u][b]Features currently under construction[/b][/u][/size][/center] [center][size=14pt][b]Automated voting rewards. Automated Donations.[/b][/size][/center]
[center][size=24pt][u][b]Media[/b][/u][/size][/center] [center][url=https://www.upload.ee/image/5441928/1.jpg][img]https://www.upload.ee/thumb/5441928/1.jpg[/img][/url] [url=https://www.upload.ee/image/5441930/2.jpg][img]https://www.upload.ee/thumb/5441930/2.jpg[/img][/url] [url=https://www.upload.ee/image/5441931/3.jpg][img]https://www.upload.ee/thumb/5441931/3.jpg[/img][/url] [url=https://www.upload.ee/image/5441934/4.png][img]https://www.upload.ee/thumb/5441934/4.png[/img][/url] [url=https://www.upload.ee/image/5441936/5.png][img]https://www.upload.ee/thumb/5441936/5.png[/img][/url] [url=https://www.upload.ee/image/5441939/6.gif][img]https://www.upload.ee/thumb/5441939/6.gif[/img][/url] [url=https://www.upload.ee/image/5441941/7.png][img]https://www.upload.ee/thumb/5441941/7.png[/img][/url] [url=https://www.upload.ee/image/5441944/8.gif][img]https://www.upload.ee/thumb/5441944/8.gif[/img][/url] [url=https://www.upload.ee/image/5441945/9.png][img]https://www.upload.ee/thumb/5441945/9.png[/img][/url][/center]
[center][size=14pt][b]Myself and the others from New Realm would like to thank you for taking your time to read this advertisment thread and we hope to see you in game soon! [color=red]- The New Realm Team[/b][/size][/center]

item.title: New Realm 718/742 | T90 Weapons | 120 Capes w/particles | Active Staff
item.dc:creator: @New_Realm New Realm
item.description:
@New_Realm wrote:

[CENTER]
[/CENTER]
[center][size=14pt]New Realm 718/742 is a new RSPS developing an amazing community and online presence. We have so much content to suit all different types of players as you will read about further on into this thread. Thank you for taking your time to read our offical advertisment thread and we hope you enjoy it - The New Realm Team[/size][/center]

[center][size=24pt]Links[/size][/center]
[center]
[size=14pt][color=blue]Website: http://newrealm718.enjin.com/
Forums: http://newrealm718.enjin.com/forum
Direct Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/0sv9k3meu45404b/NewRealm.jar?dl=0[/center]

[center][size=24pt]Features[/size][/center]

[center][size=14pt][b]-All T90 Weapons
-Full GWD
-Many Bosses ( KBD, QBD, Nex and custom bosses such as Hope Devourer, Pest Queen etc!
-Ranks: Mod, Admin, Owner, Donator, Super Donator, Extreme Donator (+dicer), Spawn and Support!
-Server Statistics quest tab
-Home is great and unique!
-Pvp System (kill streak, Hiscore) with Pvp shop

  • Ganodermic lair & Dragon lair
  • Fully working loyalty point and shop system
  • Full Dagganoths with RS drops!
  • Flaming skulls
  • Special attacks for all items the should have
  • Glacors with T85 Boot drops.
  • Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP and a Repair stand to repair them!
  • Auras are all complete and working (Purchasable with loyalty points)
  • 100% Godwars Bosses
  • Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks
  • Frost dragons
  • Dominion Tower
  • Fast Switching
  • Storm Of Armadyl Spell
  • Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers/Lunar)
  • Awesome donator and skilling zone
  • FULL RUNESPAN
  • 90% WARRIORS GUILD
  • All new 742 armours with bonuses
  • Working Duel arena
  • Falconry Hunter
  • Gnome advanced
    -The ability to switch between Item looks (::switchitemslook)
    -All 120 capes with particles!
    -Portals to teleport around New realm
    -Active staff to keep the server running flawlessly
    -Loads of custom minigames such as zombies, cage etc!
    -Many PVP locations.
    -All skills fully working.
    -Working Bank tabs.[/b][/size][/center]

[center][size=24pt]Features currently under construction[/size][/center]
[center][size=14pt]Automated voting rewards.
Automated Donations.[/size][/center]

[center][size=24pt]Media[/size][/center]
[center]







[/center]

[center][size=14pt]Myself and the others from New Realm would like to thank you for taking your time to read this advertisment thread and we hope to see you in game soon! [color=red]- The New Realm Team[/size][/center]
